categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Alku Vordu was a male senator who represented Daroon in the Imperial Senate of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. Following the dissolution of the Imperial Senate in 0 BBY, Imperial stormtroopers led by Lieutenant Falto Dragen tried to arrest the senator on Daroon for suspected Rebel ties. Before his arrest, he was rescued by Alliance operatives who escorted the former senator to the planet Alderaan, and emerged from hyperspace as it was destroyed by the Death Star.
